content:
# I have successfully harvested 10 stones into my inventory, along with the 10 coal I previously collected. 
# Now I can craft the Stone Furnace.

# 1. I will proceed to craft the Stone Furnace now that I have the required materials.
craft_item(Prototype.StoneFurnace)

# 2. After crafting, I will check my inventory to confirm that the Stone Furnace has been added.
print(f"Inventory after crafting: {inspect_inventory()}")
